8: The forced merger of UBS and Credit Suisse was seen as necessary to prevent further turmoil in global banking markets, highlighting the interconnectedness and fragility of the financial system.

10: Citigroup is contributing $5 billion to First Republic Bank to help stabilize its liquidity following the bank's recent turmoil.
